nodes.text: The vibro-lance or vibrolance was a large powered spear-like weapon that vibrated rapidly upon impact, dramatically increasing the amount of damage delivered while minimizing the effort required by the wielder.
Among the wielders of these weapons were the Witches of Dathomir and Gamorrean guards who used them against slaves or prisoners.
A vibro-lance was used by Gamorrean Guard Thok in Jabba the Hutt's palace on Tatooine. Another lance was given to a spacer by the Dathomirian witch Vhaunda.
Imperial Assassin Ennix Devian used a retractable vibro-lance during his fight with Kir Kanos.
